entry.title: LeetCode 7: Reverse Integer
entry.content: 1234567891011121314func reverse(x int) int { res := 0 for { res = res * 10 + x % 10 if x / 10 == 0 { break } x = x / 10 } if x < -0x80000000 || x > 0x7FFFFFFF { return 0 } return res}

entry.title: LeetCode 5: Longest Palindromic Substring
entry.content: 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526func longestPalindrome(s string) string { if len(s) < 2 { return s } index, max := 0, 0 for i := 0; i < len(s) { if len(s) - i > max / 2 { break } begin, end := i, i for end < len(s) - 1 && s[i] == s[i+1] { end++ } i = end + 1 for end < len(s) - 1 && begin > 0 && s[end+1] == s[begin-1] { end++ begin-- } length := end - begin + 1 if max < length { max = length index = begin } } return s[index: index + max]}

entry.title: LeetCode 3: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
entry.content: 123456789101112131415161718192021func lengthOfLongestSubstring(s string) int { m := make(map[uint8]int) res := 0 start, end := 0, 0 for end < len(s) { if p, exist := m[s[end]]; exist { start = p + 1 end = start for k, _ := range m { delete(m, k) } }else { m[s[end]] = end if end - start + 1 > res { res = end - start + 1 } end++ } } return res}

entry.title: LeetCode 2: Add Two Numbers
entry.content: 1234type ListNode struct { Val interface{} Next *ListNode} 123456789101112131415161718192021func addTwoNumbers(a, b *ListNode) *ListNode { head := new(ListNode) node := head carray := 0 for a != nil || b != nil || carray != 0 { sum := carry if a != nil { sum += a.Val a = a.Next } if b != nil { sum += b.Val b = b.Next } carry = sum / 10 node.Next = new(ListNode) node.Next.Val = sum % 10 node = node.Next } return head.Next}

entry.title: LeetCode 1: Two Sum
entry.content: 1234567891011121314151617func twoSum(nums []int, target int) []int { var res []int m := make(map[int]int) for i := 0; i < len(nums); i++ { if v,exist := m[target-nums[i]];exist { if v < i { res = append(res,v,i) }else { res = append(res,i,v) } break }else { m[nums[i]] = i } } return res}

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
